001package edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.service;
002
003import android.annotation.SuppressLint;
004import android.content.Context;
005import dagger.Module;
006import dagger.Provides;
007import dagger.hilt.android.qualifiers.ApplicationContext;
008import edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.R;
009import edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.model.Game;
010import edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.model.Guess;
011import edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.model.League;
012import edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.model.Team;
013import edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.model.dto.LeagueResponse;
014import edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.model.dto.TeamResponse;
015import edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.model.entity.GameResult;
016import edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.model.entity.User;
017import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Scheduler;
018import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Single;
019import io.reactivex.rxjava3.schedulers.Schedulers;
020import java.time.Duration;
021import java.util.Comparator;
022import java.util.List;
023import java.util.Map;
024import java.util.Random;
025import java.util.TreeMap;
026import java.util.concurrent.Executors;
027import java.util.stream.Collectors;
028import java.util.stream.Stream;
029import javax.inject.Inject;
030
031/**
032 *This repository handles starting and playing a game.
033 */
034public class TeamleRepository {
035
036  private final SportsDBProxy proxy;
037  private final GameResultRepository resultRepository;
038  private final UserRepository userRepository;
039  private final Scheduler scheduler;
040  private final String apiKey;
041  private final Random rng;
042
043  private List<Team> teams;
044  private Map<String, List<League>> leaguesBySport;
045  private Game game;
046
047  /**
048   * Handles all things needed for a game to be played
049   * @param proxy SportsDBProxy
050   * @param resultRepository GameResultRepository
051   * @param userRepository UserRepository
052   * @param context Context
053   * @param rng Random
054   */
055  @Inject
056  public TeamleRepository(SportsDBProxy proxy, GameResultRepository resultRepository,
057      UserRepository userRepository, @ApplicationContext Context context, Random rng) {
058    this.proxy = proxy;
059    this.resultRepository = resultRepository;
060    this.userRepository = userRepository;
061    this.rng = rng;
062    this.scheduler = Schedulers.from(Executors.newFixedThreadPool(4));
063    apiKey = context.getString(R.string.api_key);
064  }
065
066  /**
067   * Gets all leagues by sport
068   * @return Leagues
069   */
070  public Single<? extends Map<String, List<League>>> getAllLeaguesBySport() {
071    return proxy.getAllLeagues(apiKey)
072        .map(LeagueResponse::getLeagues)
073        .map((leagues) -> leagues.stream()
074            .collect(Collectors.groupingBy(League::getSport, TreeMap::new, Collectors.toList())))
075        .doOnSuccess((map) -> map.values()
076            .forEach((leagues) -> leagues.sort(Comparator.comparing(League::getName))))
077        .doOnSuccess((map) -> leaguesBySport = map)
078        .subscribeOn(scheduler);
079  }
080
081  /**
082   * Gets all teams in a specific league
083   * @param leagueId String
084   * @return List<Teams>
085   */
086  public Single<List<Team>> getAllTeamsByLeague(String leagueId) {
087    return proxy.getAllTeams(apiKey, leagueId)
088        .map(TeamResponse::getTeams)
089        .doOnSuccess((teams) -> this.teams = teams)
090        .subscribeOn(scheduler);
091  }
092
093  /**
094   * Handles the team selected for a guess
095   * @return Team
096   */
097  public Team pick() {
098    return teams.get(rng.nextInt(teams.size()));
099
100  }
101
102  /**
103   * Handles the start of a game
104   * @return Game
105   */
106  public Game startGame() {
107    Game game = new Game(pick());
108    this.game = game;
109    return game;
110  }
111
112  /**
113   * Handles the submission of a guess
114   * @param pick Team
115   * @return Guess
116   */
117  @SuppressLint("checkResult")
118  public Guess submitGuess(Team pick) {
119    if (game.isSolved()) {
120      throw new IllegalStateException();
121    }
122    Guess guess = new Guess(pick, game.getCorrectAnswer());
123    List<Guess> guesses = game.getGuesses();
124    guesses.add(guess);
125    if (guess.isCorrect()) {
126      GameResult result = new GameResult();
127      result.setSize(teams.size());
128      result.setGuessCount(guesses.size());
129      result.setDuration(Duration.between(guesses.get(0).created(), guesses.get(guesses.size() - 1).created()));
130      resultRepository.add(result).subscribe();
131    }
132    return guess;
133  }
134
135  /**
136   * Gets a game
137   * @return Game
138   */
139  public Game getGame() {
140    return game;
141  }
142
143  private GameResult toResult(Game game, User user) {
144    return new GameResult();
145  }
146}
